title: Wellbeing Workshop
description: If you don't know a chakra from a chorizo and prefer a pair of Jimmy Choo shoes over walking bare foot on dew covered grass, then this is the book for you.  'Wellbeing Workshop: Meditation' is a beginner's guide to the practice of mindfulness, you don't need to be on a spiritual path to enjoy the benefits of being in the now.  This book is first in the series of the back to basics guide for the modern world. They are based on a selection of personal development workshops taught by the Author at her Holistic Health Practice.
author: Shelley Wilson
